articles.title: Suspect arrested and charged as fire reignites at South Africa's Parliament - CNN
articles.description: A 49-year-old suspect has been arrested and charged in connection to a large fire that has "gutted" South Africa's Parliament in Cape Town on Sunday, police said in a statement.
